description: This source file defines a class MockOnOffCluster which simulates an On/Off device cluster for testing purposes in a Zigbee-like environment. It provides methods to turn the device on and off, handle related commands, and report attribute states.

classes.name: MockOnOffCluster
classes.description: A mock class simulating an On/Off device cluster, allowing for toggling the on/off state and handling related Zigbee commands.

methods.name: isOn
methods.description: Returns the current on/off state of the mock device.

methods.name: setOn
methods.description: Sets the on/off state of the mock device and sends an attribute report if the state changes.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Returns the attribute data bytes for the given attribute info, representing the current on/off state.

methods.name: handleCommand
methods.description: Handles command messages (like turn on or off) based on command ID and payload.
